message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $2000000. This investment promises substantial returns and long-term benefits. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product and understand its potential benefits. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the asking price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1500000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to move forward with a mutually beneficial transaction.
